comments.body: This was due to the latest changes in EC2 api (Feb 2014).
Fix is pushed to testing. Updated binding definition to reflect the latest changes in EC2's api.

On a related note, we currently accept the request even if the security group does not exist at the time task is created. When later the instance is launched, run-instance will fail, and the import-task's status will transit to 'completed', with the status message 'Image registered: emi-dae83b55, but run instance failed'.

I am seeing the instances started with the correct security group. 
{code} 
euca-import-instance cirrosraw.img -b mikeimport -z PARTI00 -f raw -t m1.small -a x86_64 -p Linux
